card.name: Abbey Gargoyles
card.property: Flying, protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though Serra has not been seen for twenty years, her gargoyles still watch over our city and punish the guilty."—Gulsen, abbey matron

card.name: Adarkar Sentinel
card.property: {1}: Adarkar Sentinel gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We encountered the sentinels in the wastes, near no living thing. Their purpose was inscrutable."—Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Aeolipile
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Aeolipile: Aeolipile deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Although fragile, the aeolipile could be quite destructive."—Sarpadian Empires, vol. I

card.name: Aether Storm
card.property: Creature spells can't be cast. Pay 4 life: Destroy Aether Storm. It can't be regenerated. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do love the rain . . . but this storm feels somehow wrong, Taysir."—Daria

card.name: Ambush Party
card.property: First strike, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fair fight? I'll take survival over chivalry any day!"—Tor Wauki, Bandit King

card.name: Anarchy
card.property: Destroy all white permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The shaman waved the staff, and the land itself went mad."—Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Angel of Fury
card.property: Flying When Angel of Fury dies, you may shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Angel of Light
card.property: Flying, vigilance

card.name: An-Zerrin Ruins
card.property: As An-Zerrin Ruins enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures of the chosen type don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The An-Zerrins have served me well, ever since I first killed them."—Baron Sengir

card.name: Armor of Faith
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {W}: Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keep your chainmail, warrior. I have my own form of protection."—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

card.name: Armor Thrull
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Armor Thrull: Put a +1/+2 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The worst thing about being a mercenary for the Ebon Hand is having to wear a dead thrull."—Ivra Jursdotter

card.name: Armored Griffin
card.property: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Ashen Ghoul
card.property: Haste {B}: Return Ashen Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if three or more creature cards are above Ashen Ghoul.

card.name: Ashnod's Cylix
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player looks at the top three cards of his or her library, puts one of them back on top of his or her library, then exiles the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few remember that Ashnod's defilement of Terisiare's resources outstripped even that of her peers.

card.name: Aurochs
card.property: Trample Whenever Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One aurochs may feed a village, but a herd will flatten it.

card.name: Aysen Bureaucrats
card.property: {T}: Tap target creature with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would say that our bureaucrats are no better than vipers—but I shouldn't insult the vipers."—Murat, death speaker

card.name: Aysen Crusader
card.property: Aysen Crusader's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Soldiers and Warriors you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A renegade rallying the rabble does not a true crusader make."—Irini Sengir

card.name: Badlands
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Balduvian Conjurer
card.property: {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The very lands of Balduvia are alive."—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

card.name: Balduvian Dead
card.property: {2} {R}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Balduvian Hydra
card.property: Balduvian Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it. Remove a +1/+0 counter from Balduvian Hydra: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Balduvian Hydra this turn. {R}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+0 counter on Balduvian Hydra. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Balduvian Trading Post
card.property: If Balduvian Trading Post would enter the battlefield, sacrifice an untapped Mountain instead. If you do, put Balduvian Trading Post onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {C}{R} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Balduvian Trading Post deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.

card.name: Barbed Sextant
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Binding Grasp
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Binding Grasp unless you pay {1}{U}. You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What I want, I take."—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

card.name: Bounty of the Hunt
card.property: You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay Bounty of the Hunt's mana cost. Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each +1/+1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a +1/+1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

card.name: Brainstorm
card.property: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I reeled from the blow, and then suddenly, I knew exactly what to do. Within moments, victory was mine."—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

card.name: Brassclaw Orcs
card.property: Brassclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A whole skin is worth a thousand victories."—Orcish veteran of the Battle of Montford

card.name: Brimstone Dragon
card.property: Flying, haste

card.name: Brine Shaman
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {1}{U}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Counter target creature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The shamans of Marit Lage do her bidding in secret, but they do it gladly."—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

card.name: Broken Visage
card.property: Destroy target nonartifact attacking creature. It can't be regenerated. Create a black Spirit creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness. Sacrifice the token at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Browse

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once great literature—now great litter."—Jaya Ballard, task mage

card.name: Burnout
card.property: Counter target instant spell if it's blue. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Carapace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2. Sacrifice Carapace: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: Caribou Range
card.property: Enchant land you control Enchanted land has "{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 0/1 white Caribou creature token." Sacrifice a Caribou token: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Cloak of Confusion
card.property: Enchant creature you control Whenever enchanted creature attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it assign no combat damage this turn. If you do, defending player discards a card at random.

card.name: Clockwork Steed
card.property: Clockwork Steed enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. Clockwork Steed can't be blocked by artifact creatures. At end of combat, if Clockwork Steed attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Combat Medic
card.property: {1} {W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Without combat medics, Icatia would probably not have withstood the forces of chaos as long as it did."—Sarpadian Empires, vol. VI

card.name: Conquer
card.property: Enchant land You control enchanted land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do we trade with those despicable elves? You don't live in forests, you burn them!"—Avram Garrisson, leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Counterspell
card.property: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The duel was going badly for me, and Zur thought I was finished. He boasted that he would eat my soul—but all he ate were his words."—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

card.name: Dance of the Dead
card.property: Enchant creature card in a graveyard When Dance of the Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Dance of the Dead." Put enchanted creature card onto the battlefield tapped under your control and attach Dance of the Dead to it. When Dance of the Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {1}{B}. If he or she does, untap that creature.

card.name: Dark Banishing
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Will not the mountains quake and hills melt at the coming of the darkness? Share this vision with your enemies, Lim-Dûl, and they shall wither."—Leshrac, Walker of Night

card.name: Death Spark
card.property: Death Spark deals 1 damage to target creature or player. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

card.name: Deep Spawn
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Deep Spawn unless you put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. {U}: Deep Spawn gains shroud until end of turn and doesn't untap during your next untap step. Tap Deep Spawn. (A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Demonic Consultation
card.property: Choose a card name. Exile the top six cards of your library, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the chosen name. Put that card into your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

card.name: Despotic Scepter
card.property: {T}: Destroy target permanent you own. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We were not meant to have such terrible things. They should be left where we found them, if not destroyed!"—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

card.name: Diabolic Vision
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the true path. I will not warm myself by the fire—I will become the flame."—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Disenchant
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew!"—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

card.name: Dreams of the Dead
card.property: {1} {U}: Return target white or black creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains "Cumulative upkeep {2}." If the creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless he or she pays its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: Drift of the Dead
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Drift of the Dead's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take their dead, and entomb them in the snow. Risen, they shall serve a new purpose."—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Dry Spell
card.property: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wherever water is lacking, all things suffer."—Autumn Willow

card.name: Dwarven Ruins
card.property: Dwarven Ruins enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Dwarven Ruins: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Dystopia
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a green or white permanent.

card.name: Earthlink
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Earthlink unless you pay {2}. Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller sacrifices a land.

card.name: Ebon Praetor
card.property: First strike, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -2/-2 counter on Ebon Praetor. Sacrifice a creature: Remove a -2/-2 counter from Ebon Praetor. If the sacrificed creature was a Thrull, put a +1/+0 counter on Ebon Praetor. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.

card.name: Ebon Stronghold
card.property: Ebon Stronghold enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Ebon Stronghold: Add {B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Elemental Augury
card.property: {3}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the changing of perception that is important."—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Elkin Bottle
card.property: {3}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card.

card.name: Elven Lyre
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Elven Lyre: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars are uncertain whether it was the actual sound or some other magical property of the elven lyre that transformed its player.

card.name: Elvish Farmer
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Elvish Farmer. Remove three spore counters from Elvish Farmer: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Sacrifice a Saproling: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Elvish Hunter
card.property: {1} {G}, {T}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the climate cooled, many elves turned to thallid farming for food, while the hunters honed their skills on what little game remained."—Sarpadian Empires, vol. III

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can any human hope to match our skills? We are children of Fyndhorn, and its sap runs in our veins."—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

card.name: Elvish Spirit Guide
card.property: Exile Elvish Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are never without guidance, if we but seek it."—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

card.name: Energy Storm
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt by instant and sorcery spells. Creatures with flying don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Enervate
card.property: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Worlds turn in crucial moments of decision. Make your choice."—Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran royal mage

card.name: Errand of Duty
card.property: Create a 1/1 white Knight creature token with banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May they speed to their task, for the skyknights alone cannot hold Kjeldor safe."—Arna Kennerüd, skycaptain

card.name: Errantry
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and can only attack alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no shame in solitude. The lone knight may succeed where a hundred founder."—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

card.name: Essence Filter
card.property: Destroy all enchantments or all nonwhite enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Freyalise has cleansed our bodies and minds of the plagues of Kjeldor; all she asks in return is that we keep pure our newly given home in Fyndhorn."—Kolbjörn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Essence Flare
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never underestimate the power of the soul unleashed.

card.name: Farrel's Mantle
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks and isn't blocked, its controller may have it deal damage equal to its power plus 2 to another target creature. If that player does, the attacking creature assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Farrel's Zealot
card.property: Whenever Farrel's Zealot attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it deal 3 damage to target creature. If you do, Farrel's Zealot assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Farrel and his followers became a formidable band of vigilantes, battling Icatians and followers of Tourach.

card.name: Feral Thallid
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Feral Thallid. Remove three spore counters from Feral Thallid: Regenerate Feral Thallid.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Born and bred of fungus, thallids were nearly impossible to kill."—Sarpadian Empires, vol. I

card.name: Fire Dragon
card.property: Flying When Fire Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Flame Spirit
card.property: {R}: Flame Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The spirit of the flame is the spirit of change."—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

card.name: Folk of the Pines
card.property: {1} {G}: Folk of the Pines gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our friends of the forest take many forms, yet all serve the will of Freyalise."—Laina of the Elvish Council

card.name: Forbidden Lore
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn."

card.name: Forgotten Lore
card.property: Target opponent chooses a card in your graveyard. You may pay {G}. If you do, repeat this process except that opponent can't choose a card already chosen for Forgotten Lore. Then put the last chosen card into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In ashes are the gems of history.

card.name: Foul Familiar
card.property: Foul Familiar can't block. {B}, Pay 1 life: Return Foul Familiar to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Serve me, and live forever."—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Fumarole
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Fumarole, pay 3 life. Destroy target creature and target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too many of us have died in the explosions that wrack these hills."—Klazina Jansdotter, leader of the Order of the Sacred Torch

card.name: Funeral March
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, its controller sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This party is such fun—but it's a shame to mourn just one."—Irini Sengir

card.name: Fungal Bloom
card.property: {G} {G}: Put a spore counter on target Fungus.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thallids could absorb energy from the forest itself. Even elves were at a disadvantage in fighting them."—Sarpadian Empires, vol. III

card.name: Fyndhorn Pollen
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) All creatures get -1/-0. {1}{G}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I breathed deeply, and suddenly I knew not who or where I was."—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

card.name: Gangrenous Zombies
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Gangrenous Zombies: Gangrenous Zombies deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. If you control a snow Swamp, Gangrenous Zombies deals 2 damage to each creature and each player instead.

card.name: Giant Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here in Fyndhorn, the goddess Freyalise is generous to her children."—Kolbjörn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Giant Trap Door Spider

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So large and so quiet—a combination best avoided."—Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Glacial Chasm
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 2 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Glacial Chasm enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land. Creatures you control can't attack. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

card.name: Glacial Crevasses
card.property: Sacrifice a snow Mountain: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We were chasing Lim-Dûl when the ridge in front of us suddenly crumbled. I can't believe it was mere coincidence."—Lucilde Fiksdotter, leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Goblin Ski Patrol
card.property: {1} {R}: Goblin Ski Patrol gets +2/+0 and gains flying. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only once and only if you control a snow Mountain.

card.name: Gorilla Shaman

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each generation teaches the next that artifice is the enemy of natural order."—Kaysa, elder druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Grandmother Sengir
card.property: {1} {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rarely have power and madness been so delightfully wed as they have in our dear grandmother."—Baron Sengir

card.name: Gustha's Scepter
card.property: {T}: Exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at it for as long as it remains exiled. {T}: Return a card you own exiled with Gustha's Scepter to your hand. When you lose control of Gustha's Scepter, put all cards exiled with Gustha's Scepter into their owner's graveyard.

card.name: Havenwood Battleground
card.property: Havenwood Battleground enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Havenwood Battleground: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Heart of Yavimaya
card.property: If Heart of Yavimaya would enter the battlefield, sacrifice a Forest instead. If you do, put Heart of Yavimaya onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Helm of Obedience
card.property: {X}, {T}: Target opponent puts cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard until a creature card or X cards are put into that graveyard this way, whichever comes first. If a creature card is put into that graveyard this way, sacrifice Helm of Obedience and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. X can't be 0.

card.name: Icatian Javelineers
card.property: Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it. {T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: Icatian Javelineers deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Icatian Phalanx
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even after the wall was breached in half a dozen places, the phalanxes fought on, standing solidly against the onrushing raiders. Disciplined and dedicated, they held their ranks to the end, even in the face of tremendous losses.

card.name: Icatian Scout
card.property: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Because the orc hordes attacked along the entire border, Scouts were essential to Icatia's defense."—Sarpadian Empires, vol. VI

card.name: Ice Floe
card.property: You may choose not to untap Ice Floe during your untap step. {T}: Tap target creature without flying that's attacking you. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Ice Floe remains tapped.

card.name: Iceberg
card.property: Iceberg enters the battlefield with X ice counters on it. {3}: Put an ice counter on Iceberg. Remove an ice counter from Iceberg: Add {C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Icequake
card.property: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, Icequake deals 1 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the earth shakes, and their animals are swallowed up by the ground, perhaps they will think twice before attacking again."—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Icy Prison
card.property: When Icy Prison enters the battlefield, exile target creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Icy Prison unless any player pays {3}. When Icy Prison leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Ihsan's Shade
card.property: Protection from white

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ihsan, the weak. Ihsan, the fallen. Ihsan, the betrayer. He has brought shame to the Serra paladins where none existed before. May his suffering equal his betrayal."—Baris, Serra inquisitor

card.name: Imperial Recruiter
card.property: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Imperial Seal
card.property: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If Heaven has placed it in your hands, it means that the throne is destined to be yours."

card.name: Incinerate
card.property: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description."—Jaya Ballard, task mage

card.name: Infernal Darkness
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Pay {B} and 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) If a land is tapped for mana, it produces {B} instead of any other type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I thought the day had brought enough horrors for our ragged band, but the night was far worse."—Lucilde Fiksdotter, leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Inheritance
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {3}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More than lessons may be gained from the past."—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran priest

card.name: Ironclaw Orcs
card.property: Ironclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Generations of genetic weeding have given rise to the deviously cowardly Ironclaw clan.

card.name: Ivory Gargoyle
card.property: Flying When Ivory Gargoyle dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step and you skip your next draw step. {4}{W}: Exile Ivory Gargoyle.

card.name: Jester's Mask
card.property: Jester's Mask enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Mask: Target opponent puts the cards from his or her hand on top of his or her library. Search that player's library for that many cards. That player puts those cards into his or her hand, then shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Jeweled Amulet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Jeweled Amulet. Note the type of mana spent to pay this activation cost. Activate this ability only if there are no charge counters on Jeweled Amulet. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Jeweled Amulet: Add one mana of Jeweled Amulet's last noted type to your mana pool.

card.name: Johtull Wurm
card.property: Whenever Johtull Wurm becomes blocked, it gets -2/-1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To bring her down we must be on all sides at once—leave one avenue open and we'll all be dead."—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

card.name: Joven's Ferrets
card.property: Whenever Joven's Ferrets attacks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn. At end of combat, tap all creatures that blocked Joven's Ferrets this turn. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

card.name: Juniper Order Advocate
card.property: As long as Juniper Order Advocate is untapped, green creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In these troubled times, we alone carry the hope of reconciliation between Elf and Human."—Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order advocate

card.name: Karplusan Giant
card.property: Tap an untapped snow land you control: Karplusan Giant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They aren't the brightest or the quickest of giants. For that matter, the same holds true if you compare them to rocks."—Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Kaysa
card.property: Green creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kaysa speaks as the elder druid, but Yavimaya recognizes only one voice: its own.

card.name: Kjeldoran Dead
card.property: When Kjeldoran Dead enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. {B}: Regenerate Kjeldoran Dead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They shall kill those whom once they loved."—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Kjeldoran Elite Guard
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Kjeldoran Elite Guard. Activate this ability only during combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The winged helms of the guard are put on for pageants—but taken off for war.

card.name: Kjeldoran Home Guard
card.property: At end of combat, if Kjeldoran Home Guard attacked or blocked this combat, put a -0/-1 counter on Kjeldoran Home Guard and create a 0/1 white Deserter creature token.

card.name: Kjeldoran Outpost
card.property: If Kjeldoran Outpost would enter the battlefield, sacrifice a Plains instead. If you do, put Kjeldoran Outpost onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {1}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

card.name: Kjeldoran Skycaptain
card.property: Flying; first strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If we do our duty and uphold our honor, Kjeldor shall stand for a thousand years."—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

card.name: Knight of Stromgald
card.property: Protection from white {B}: Knight of Stromgald gains first strike until end of turn. {B}{B}: Knight of Stromgald gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kjeldorans should rule supreme, and to the rest, death!"—Avram Garrisson, leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Krovikan Fetish
card.property: Enchant creature When Krovikan Fetish enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some Krovikans find strength in the ears and eyes of their victims and wear such fetishes into battle.

card.name: Krovikan Horror
card.property: At the beginning of the end step, if Krovikan Horror is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may return Krovikan Horror to your hand. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Krovikan Horror deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Krovikan Sorcerer
card.property: {T}, Discard a nonblack card: Draw a card. {T}, Discard a black card: Draw two cards, then discard one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These sorcerers always seem to have another surprise up their sleeves."—Zur the Enchanter

card.name: Krovikan Vampire
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, if a creature dealt damage by Krovikan Vampire this turn died, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Sacrifice it when you lose control of Krovikan Vampire.

card.name: Lat-Nam's Legacy
card.property: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the knowledge of Lat-Nam could not protect its sages from the Brothers' War."—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Lava Burst
card.property: Lava Burst deals X damage to target creature or player. If Lava Burst would deal damage to a creature, that damage can't be prevented or dealt instead to another creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Overkill? This isn't a game of Kick-the-Ouphe!"—Jaya Ballard, task mage

card.name: Leaping Lizard
card.property: {1} {G}: Leaping Lizard gets -0/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never question the Autumn Willow about her motives, not even when she turns people into lizards. It's her way."—Devin, faerie noble

card.name: Lim-Dûl's High Guard
card.property: First strike {1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The guard will forever stand ready. For them, death is merely an inconvenience, not an ending."—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

card.name: Lodestone Bauble
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Lodestone Bauble: Put up to four target basic land cards from a player's graveyard on top of his or her library in any order. That player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Lost Order of Jarkeld
card.property: As Lost Order of Jarkeld enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Lost Order of Jarkeld's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of creatures the chosen player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let us remember brave Jarkeld and his troops, who perished in the Adarkar Wastes so long ago."—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

card.name: Magus of the Unseen
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: Untap target artifact an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the artifact, tap it.

card.name: Mana Crypt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Marjhan
card.property: Marjhan doesn't untap during your untap step. {U}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Untap Marjhan. Activate this ability only during your upkeep. Marjhan can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {U}{U}: Marjhan gets -1/-0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to target attacking creature without flying. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Marjhan.

card.name: Mesmeric Trance
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {U}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Magic overused can freeze the mind. Creativity is more important than power."—Zur the Enchanter

card.name: Meteor Shower
card.property: Meteor Shower deals X plus 1 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eenie, meenie, minie, moe . . . oh, why not all of them?"—Jaya Ballard, task mage

card.name: Minion of Leshrac
card.property: Protection from black At the beginning of your upkeep, Minion of Leshrac deals 5 damage to you unless you sacrifice a creature other than Minion of Leshrac. If Minion of Leshrac deals damage to you this way, tap it. {T}: Destroy target creature or land.

card.name: Mishra's Groundbreaker
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Groundbreaker: Target land becomes a 3/3 artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The very ground yielded to Mishra's wishes.

card.name: Misinformation
card.property: Put up to three target cards from an opponent's graveyard on top of his or her library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you cannot rely on your sources, trust your own senses. When you cannot trust those, you must follow your instincts."—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

card.name: Mudslide
card.property: Creatures without flying don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped creatures without flying he or she controls and pay {2} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

card.name: Musician
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {T}: Put a music counter on target creature. If it doesn't have "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature unless you pay {1} for each music counter on it," it gains that ability.

card.name: Narwhal
card.property: First strike, protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who needs a spear? Ya break off the horn, and ya stab the fish with it. Easy!"—Kakra, sea troll

card.name: Nature's Blessing
card.property: {G} {W}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or that creature gains banding, first strike, or trample. (This effect lasts indefinitely. Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be open to the blessings, whatever their form."—Kaysa, elder druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Nature's Wrath
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nature's Wrath unless you pay {G}. Whenever a player puts an Island or blue permanent onto the battlefield, he or she sacrifices an Island or blue permanent. Whenever a player puts a Swamp or black permanent onto the battlefield, he or she sacrifices a Swamp or black permanent.

card.name: Necrite
card.property: Whenever Necrite attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature defending player controls. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Necrites killed Jherana Rure, ending the counterinsurgency.

card.name: Necropotence
card.property: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Night Soil
card.property: {1}, Exile two creature cards from a single graveyard: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves gathered huge piles of rot to grow fungus. Out of imitation or forethought, the thallids did the same.

card.name: Orc General
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice another Orc or Goblin: Other Orc creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your army must fear you more than the enemy. Only then will you triumph."—Malga Phlegmtooth

card.name: Orcish Cannoneers
card.property: {T}: Orcish Cannoneers deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a thankless job, and you'll probably die in an explosion. But the pay is pretty good."—Toothlicker Harj, orcish captain

card.name: Orcish Captain
card.property: {1}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, target Orc creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. If you lose the flip, it gets -0/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's a chance to win every battle.

card.name: Orcish Conscripts
card.property: Orcish Conscripts can't attack unless at least two other creatures attack. Orcish Conscripts can't block unless at least two other creatures block.

card.name: Orcish Farmer
card.property: {T}: Target land becomes a Swamp until its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, the farmers keep our soldiers fed. But why do they have to make every battlefield a pigpen?"—Toothlicker Harj, orcish captain

card.name: Orcish Lumberjack
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How did I ever let myself get talked into this project?"—Toothlicker Harj, orcish captain

card.name: Orcish Squatters
card.property: Whenever Orcish Squatters attacks and isn't blocked, you may gain control of target land defending player controls for as long as you control Orcish Squatters. If you do, Orcish Squatters assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Orcish Veteran
card.property: Orcish Veteran can't block white creatures with power 2 or greater. {R}: Orcish Veteran gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unsuccessful in their early battle for Montford, the orcs quickly tempered their bloodlust with cowardice.

card.name: Order of the Sacred Torch
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target black spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A blazing light to drive out the shadows.

card.name: Order of the White Shield
card.property: Protection from black {W}: Order of the White Shield gains first strike until end of turn. {W}{W}: Order of the White Shield gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shall we turn away a worthy soul because his parents were peasants? I think not."—Lucilde Fiksdotter, leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Panic
card.property: Cast Panic only during combat before blockers are declared. Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you'd been there, you would've run from that deer, too!"—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Personal Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

card.name: Phantasmal Fiend
card.property: {B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Phantasmal Mount
card.property: Flying {T}: Target creature you control with toughness 2 or less gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. When Phantasmal Mount leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice that creature. When the creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Phantasmal Mount.

card.name: Phyrexian Devourer
card.property: When Phyrexian Devourer's power is 7 or greater, sacrifice it. Exile the top card of your library: Put X +1/+1 counters on Phyrexian Devourer, where X is the exiled card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Phyrexian Portal
card.property: {3}: If your library has ten or more cards in it, target opponent looks at the top ten cards of your library and separates them into two face-down piles. Exile one of those piles. Search the other pile for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle the rest of that pile into your library.

card.name: Pillage
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Were they to reduce us to ash, we would clog their throats and sting their eyes in payment."—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

card.name: Portent
card.property: Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle his or her library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Pyrokinesis
card.property: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay Pyrokinesis's mana cost. Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anybody want some . . . toast?"—Jaya Ballard, task mage

card.name: Ravages of War
card.property: Destroy all lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thorn bushes spring up wherever the army has passed. Lean years follow in the wake of a great war."—Lao Tzu, Tao Te Ching, trans. Feng and English

card.name: Ray of Command
card.property: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

card.name: Red Cliffs Armada
card.property: Red Cliffs Armada can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By the battle of Red Cliffs in the year 208, the Wu kingdom controlled more than seven thousand warships on the Yangtze.

card.name: Reinforcements
card.property: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let them send their legions! I will show them that my truth is stronger than their swords."—General Varchild

card.name: Reprisal
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes."—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran priest

card.name: Retribution
card.property: Choose two target creatures an opponent controls. That player chooses and sacrifices one of those creatures. Put a -1/-1 counter on the other.

card.name: Righteous Fury
card.property: Destroy all tapped creatures. You gain 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

card.name: Ritual of Subdual
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) If a land is tapped for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That which does not bend to the will of Freyalise shall surely break."—Kolbjörn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Ritual of the Machine
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Ritual of the Machine, sacrifice a creature. Gain control of target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rumors persist of dark deeds performed in the depths of Soldev. When will Dagsson heed the danger therein?"—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

card.name: Rogue Skycaptain
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, put a wage counter on Rogue Skycaptain. You may pay {2} for each wage counter on it. If you don't, remove all wage counters from Rogue Skycaptain and an opponent gains control of it.

card.name: Roterothopter
card.property: Flying {2}: Roterothopter gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The roterothoper is as insidious as it is ingenious. It is one of the few creations of our school that I take no pride in."—Baki, wizard attendant

card.name: Royal Decree
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever a Swamp, Mountain, black permanent, or red permanent becomes tapped, Royal Decree deals 1 damage to that permanent's controller.

card.name: Royal Trooper
card.property: Whenever Royal Trooper blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fortune does not side with the fainthearted."—Sophocles, Phaedra

card.name: Ruins of Trokair
card.property: Ruins of Trokair enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Ruins of Trokair: Add {W}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Sacred Boon
card.property: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, put a +0/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Divine gifts are granted to those who are worthy."—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

card.name: Savannah
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Scars of the Veteran
card.property: You may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay Scars of the Veteran's mana cost. Prevent the next 7 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, put a +0/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.

card.name: Screeching Drake
card.property: Flying When Screeching Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Sea Drake
card.property: Flying When Sea Drake enters the battlefield, return two target lands you control to their owner's hand.

card.name: Sea Spirit
card.property: {U}: Sea Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It rose above our heads, above the ship, and still higher yet. No foggy, ice-laden sea in the world could frighten me more."—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Shield Bearer
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have almost completed your four years, my son. Soon you shall be a skyknight."—Arna Kennerüd, skyknight

card.name: Shrink
card.property: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not fear adversity. Let your courage be your strength."—Onatah, Anaba shaman

card.name: Shyft
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Shyft become the color or colors of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Capturing this specimen was not easy. Study it well, that you someday might be as versatile."—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Sibilant Spirit
card.property: Flying Whenever Sibilant Spirit attacks, defending player may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Relax. I'm sure it's just a snake hissing."—Avram Garrisson, leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Skeleton Ship
card.property: When you control no Islands, sacrifice Skeleton Ship. {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sea gives up her dead as easily as the soil."—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

card.name: Skull Catapult
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let any who doubt the evil of using the ancient devices look at this infernal machine. What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?"—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

card.name: Snow Fortress
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {1}: Snow Fortress gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {1}: Snow Fortress gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {3}: Snow Fortress deals 1 damage to target creature without flying that's attacking you.

card.name: Snow-Covered Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Snow-Covered Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Snow-Covered Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Snow-Covered Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Snow-Covered Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Soldevi Digger
card.property: {2}: Put the top card of your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This ceaseless device has helped uncover marvels unreachable by mere flesh."—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

card.name: Soldevi Excavations
card.property: If Soldevi Excavations would enter the battlefield, sacrifice an untapped Island instead. If you do, put Soldevi Excavations onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {C}{U} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Soldevi Simulacrum
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {1}: Soldevi Simulacrum gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Songs of the Damned
card.property: Add {B} to your mana pool for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not wind, but the breath of the dead.

card.name: Soul Exchange
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Soul Exchange, exile a creature you control. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +2/+2 counter on that creature if the exiled creature was a Thrull.

card.name: Soul Kiss
card.property: Enchant creature {B}, Pay 1 life: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.

card.name: Spore Cloud
card.property: Tap all blocking creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Each attacking creature and each blocking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Spore Flower
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Spore Flower. Remove three spore counters from Spore Flower: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Stampede
card.property: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We could see the horizon blacken with the great beasts, but it was too late. The icefield offered no immediate safety, but luckily most of us reached a crevasse in which we could take cover."—Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Stone Spirit
card.property: Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The spirit of the stone is the spirit of strength."—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

card.name: Stonehands
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Trust in the power of stone. Stone is strong; stone shatters swords; stone breaks bones. Trust in stone."—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

card.name: Storm Elemental
card.property: Flying {U}, Exile the top card of your library: Tap target creature with flying. {U}, Exile the top card of your library: If the exiled card is a snow land, Storm Elemental gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Storm Spirit
card.property: Flying {T}: Storm Spirit deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Come to us, with your lightning. Come to us, with your thunder. Serve us with your strength, and smite our foes with your power."—Steinar Icefist, Balduvian shaman

card.name: Stromgald Cabal
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target white spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kjeldor must be supreme at any cost."—Avram Garrisson, leader of the Knights of Stromgald

card.name: Stunted Growth
card.property: Target player chooses three cards from his or her hand and puts them on top of his or her library in any order.

card.name: Sustaining Spirit
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faith is our greatest protector."—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran priest

card.name: Svyelunite Temple
card.property: Svyelunite Temple enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Svyelunite Temple: Add {U}{U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The so-called barbarians will not respect us for our military might—they will respect us for our honor."—Lucilde Fiksdotter, leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Taiga
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Temporal Manipulation
card.property: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Doing something at the last minute isn't so bad when you can make that minute last.

card.name: Thallid
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid. Remove three spore counters from Thallid: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Thallid Devourer
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid Devourer. Remove three spore counters from Thallid Devourer: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Sacrifice a Saproling: Thallid Devourer gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Thelonite Druid
card.property: {1} {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Forests you control become 2/3 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The magic at the heart of all living things can bear awe-inspiring fruit."—Kolevi of Havenwood, elder druid

card.name: Thermokarst
card.property: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finally we understand the lesson of our home: loss begets renewal."—Kolbjörn, elder druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Thought Lash
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Exile the top card of your library. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When a player doesn't pay Thought Lash's cumulative upkeep, that player exiles all cards from his or her library. Exile the top card of your library: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

card.name: Thunder Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying {U}: Thunder Wall gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The lemures had barely taken wing when the sky roared with thunder. The swarm of little beasts wavered, divided, and fell, crashing to the earth."—General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

card.name: Time Bomb
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on Time Bomb. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Time Bomb: Time Bomb deals damage equal to the number of time counters on it to each creature and each player.

card.name: Tinder Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool. {R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Tinder Wall deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

card.name: Tundra
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Underground Sea
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Varchild's Crusader
card.property: {0}: Varchild's Crusader can't be blocked this turn except by Walls. Sacrifice Varchild's Crusader at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every patch of land must belong to Kjeldor, no matter what the cost!"—General Varchild

card.name: Viscerid Armor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {1}{U}: Return Viscerid Armor to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fallen viscerid's only tribute is to be worn by a comrade.

card.name: Viscerid Drone
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature and a Swamp: Destroy target nonartifact creature. It can't be regenerated. {T}, Sacrifice a creature and a snow Swamp: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all of Terisiare's flooding was natural . . . .

card.name: Wall of Kelp
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {U}{U}, {T}: Create a 0/1 blue Plant Wall creature token with defender named Kelp.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ya can eat it or ya can weave it, but ya can't fight in it."—Zeki, reef pirate

card.name: Warning
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The folk of the Karplusan mountains are impossible to ambush."—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

card.name: Whirling Catapult
card.property: {2}, Exile the top two cards of your library: Whirling Catapult deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Direct confrontation never was to the orcs' taste."—General Varchild

card.name: Whiteout
card.property: All creatures lose flying until end of turn. Sacrifice a snow land: Return Whiteout from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Wiitigo
card.property: Wiitigo enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Wiitigo if it has blocked or been blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

card.name: Wind Spirit
card.property: Flying Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To visit the sky requires bravery, and thought, and little else. To master the sky requires the binding of its masters, and little else."—Arnjlot Olasson, sky mage

card.name: Wings of Aesthir
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying and first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For those of courage, even the sky holds no limit."—Arnjlot Olasson, sky mage

card.name: Winter's Night
card.property: Whenever a player taps a snow land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Withering Wisps
card.property: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Withering Wisps. {B}: Withering Wisps deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Activate this ability no more times each turn than the number of snow Swamps you control.

card.name: Wolf Pack
card.property: You may have Wolf Pack assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Woolly Mammoths
card.property: Woolly Mammoths has trample as long as you control a snow land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mammoths may be good to ride on, but they're certainly bad to fall off of!"—Disa the Restless, journal entry

card.name: Woolly Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a spider without an appetite."—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

card.name: Yavimaya Ancients
card.property: {G}: Yavimaya Ancients gets +1/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We orphans of Fyndhorn have found no welcome in this alien place."—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

card.name: Zuran Spellcaster
card.property: {T}: Zuran Spellcaster deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A mage must be precise as well as potent; cautious, as well as clever."—Zur the Enchanter
